description: APPLICATION FOR THE ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION, THE FORMATION OF A SINGLE STOREY BASEMENT BENEATH THE GROUND FLOOR REAR EXTENSION AND RAISED GARDEN TERRACING. THE PART RE-CONFIGURATION AND REFURBISHMENT OF THE GROUND AND FIRST FLOOR. THE ERECTION OF DORMERS TO THE FRONT AND REAR WITHIN THE MAIN ROOF AND THE CONVERSION OF THE EXISTING ROOF SPACE INTO ACCOMMODATION. THE FULL REPLACEMENT OF THE EXISTING ROOF COVERINGS TO MATCH EXISTING, INCLUDING THE INSTALLATION OF CONSERVATION STYLE ROOFLIGHTS. THE REFURBISHMENT OF THE FACADE TO THE FRONT AND REAR, INCLUDING THE REPLACEMENT OF THE EXISTING FRONT PORCH AND THE REPLACEMENT OF THE HALF TIMBERING WITH HANGING CLAY TILES TO MATCH EXISTING. THE REPLACEMENT OF THE EXISTING FRONT GARDEN FENCE WITH A LOW LEVEL GARDEN WALL. THE REPLACEMENT OF THE SINGLE-GLAZED WINDOWS THROUGHOUT WITH SLIMLINE HERITAGE DOUBLE GLAZING. THE CONVERSION OF THE EXISTING GARAGE INTO AN ANNEXE FOR ANCILLARY USE. THE ERECTION OF A ANCILLARY SINGLE STOREY GARDEN ROOM FOR A HOME OFFICE, AND THE INSTALLATION OF 3 X ASHP'S WITHIN AN ACOUSTIC ENCLOSURE IN THE REAR GARDEN.

Condition : 6 - No Use of Flat Roof  - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 7 - Screening - The screening or enclosure to the platform of the outbuilding as shown on the approved plans shall be implemented before the development is first occupied and retained permanently thereafter.

Condition : 8 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 9 - Tree Protection - The developmetn shall be carreid out in accordance with  BS5837:2012 TREE SURVEY AND ARBORICULTURAL IMPACT ASSESSMENT: 33 Marryat Road, London, SW19 5BE Dated: 25th September 2024 reference: GHA/DS/165550:2.  The details and measures as approved shall be retained and maintained, until the completion of all site operations.

Condition : 10 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be rented, sold independently or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the main residential use of the dwelling known as 33 Marryat Road, Wimbledon, SW19 5BE.

Condition : 11 - INFORMATIVE
No surface water runoff should discharge onto the public highway including the public footway or highway. When it is proposed to connect to a public sewer, the site drainage should be separate and combined at the final manhole nearest the boundary.   Where the developer proposes to discharge to a public sewer, prior approval from Thames Water Developer Services will be required (contact no. 0845 850 2777).

No waste material, including concrete, mortar, grout, plaster, fats, oils and chemicals shall be washed down on the highway or disposed of into the highway drainage system
